name: Look What I've Made
description:
· LOOK WHAT I'VE MADE

Your good old friend has finally finished his game and you will be the first to try it. Escape from the underground in a Metroidvania/souls-like/RPG game. Choose your character, upgrade it and defeat The Guardian to claim revenge.

· Authors

- Gerard Coquard - Programmer & Producer

- Hector Vergel - Programmer & VFX Artist

- Nil Muns - Narrator & Sound Effects

- Cora Real - Artist

- Jan De Nobel - Designer & Writer

· How to install the game:

- Click on the download button.

- Unzip the ".rar" file.

- Open the folder "Look What I've Made" and execute the .exe file.

- Enjoy! 

· Explore the world and its different scenarios

 · Fight against different enemies and learn how to defeat them · Master the jump and get over difficult platforms
